name: Pot Pie Lunch (Local L.A. Delivery Only)
description:
How about a delicious lunch of Frankie and Tiny's Pot Pies and all of the fixings delivered to your home or office! 

Lunch includes
-Mixed Green Salad
-Choice of Savory Pot Pie
-Choice of Farmers Market Veggie
-Fresh Baked Dessert
-Beverage

All cutlery,plate ware and silver ware is included.
There is a minimum order of 5 lunches.

Delivery (shipping) is $10.00 inclusive
Please give us 24 hours notice.

name: 10" Savory Pie (Local L.A. Delivery Only)
description:
Your choice of a Savory Pot Pie-

Choices are
-Grandma Cowboys Chicken
(Grilled Chicken Breast in a traditional BÃ©chamel with Fresh Basil, Dill and Farmers Market Veggies)

(Pulled Pork Butt smothered in a Black Strap Mollasses and Whole Grain Mustard BBQ Sauce with Red and Green Bell Peppers, Jalapenos and Louisiana Hot Suace)

Pies are delivered to your front door. Visit our website or give us a call and arrange a time. 

Pies are baked fresh, so please allow 24 hours notice.
Delivery Charge is $5.00

name: 10" Sweet Pie (Local L.A. Delivery Only)
description: Any Sweet Pie on our Frankie and Tiny's menu (found on our website). Delivered straight to your front door. Visit our website or give us a call to arrange a time. Please allow 24 hours notice. Delivery charge is $5.00.

name: 9" Missouri Mud Pie (Shipped Continental USA)
description:
Our famous Missouri Mud Pie sent straight to your front door! A 9" Flourless Chocolate Pie in a Toasted Pecan and Graham Crust topped with Toasted Homemade Marshmallow. It's divine. Great cold or warmed through with ice cream! This pie is best served warm and serves 8-10 people.

Pies are mailed Monday and Tuesday of each week. They are sent through USPS via 2-3 day Priority Mail. Each order will be mailed in a separate box to ensure integrity of the product. The shipping rate of $10.00 will be applied to each box and can not be combined at this time. 

If you wish to inquire about expedited shipping please contact us directly at 213-448-8072 or email at carrie@thatgirlcarrie.com.

name: 5" Missouri Mud Pie 4 Pack (Shipped Continental U.S.A.)
description:
Our famous Missouri Mud Pie sent straight to your front door! Four 5" Flourless Chocolate Pies in a Toasted Pecan and Graham Crust topped with Toasted Homemade Marshmallow. They are divine. Great cold or warmed through with ice cream! These Mini Pies are great for kids parties, meetings at the office and family picnics. Each pie feeds 2-3 people.

Pies are mailed Monday and Tuesday of each week. They are sent through USPS via 2-3 day Priority Mail. Each order will be mailed in a separate box to ensure integrity of the product. The shipping rate of $10.00 will be applied to each box and can not be combined at this time. 

If you wish to inquire about expedited shipping please contact us directly at 213-448-8072 or email at carrie@thatgirlcarrie.com.
